name: OLEDERA
description: A OLED Friendly ResetERA theme that's more beneficial for devices with OLED Displays. Based off of "ResetERA Variables" Also created by me.
additional_info:
Version 1.1:
- Fixed Logo Again (Whoops)

Version 1.0:
- Fully complete!
- Code Base is now the exact same as "ResetERA Variables", However it will stay as it's own style to make it easier to just install instead of tweaking the other one.
- Fixed Logo Design
- Fixed Text Editor Hover Colours 

Version 0.2:
- Themed Image / Link Box
- Tweaked Linked text colour because it's hard to read.

Version 0.1:
- First Release!
- Differing code base from "NightERA but Blue" Due to the fact that ResetERA uses the same CSS for both Mobile & Desktop
- OLED friendly background colours
